summary: In other words, replace the ordinary Skyrim Coin with a Doughnut.
descriptionHtml:
in this case, every single coin, and if you rob a person of their coin, the model is now a doughnut.

It looks like something you can make outta playdough, but please, do not ingest. For all we know, this is pure Bronze, and I don\'t wanna know what kind of poisoning this can do to an infant.

so, this has purple icing, and a horrid bread texture that looks like plastic... but it still makes me laugh whenever I pickpocket it off of someone. hopefully will be the same effect for others alike.

only error... well, sorta, I think i can fix it with changing the collisions: it stands halway into the table from the base of the doughnut.
author: Kirbypop
